mpmToolbox.projectData.alignment

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • mpmToolbox.projectData.alignment.Note

  • public class Note
extends java.lang.Object
    An MSM note element plus some performance data such as milliseconds.date, milliseconds.date.end and velocity.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private double initialMillisecondsDate

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Double getDate()

      read the tick duration of the note

      get the xml:id of the note

      retrieve the MSM part that this note belongs to

      read the pitch of the note
      double getVelocity()
      read the velocity of the note
      nu.xom.Element getXml()
      access the original MSM element
      boolean isFixed()
      is the note fixed (it keeps it values even if surrounding notes change) or floating (adapts to changes of the surrounding notes' values)
      void reset()
      undo all changes and set the note's initial values

      setter to fix the note's values

      print the note data

        protected Note(nu.xom.Element xml)
        throws com.sun.media.sound.InvalidDataException,
               java.lang.NumberFormatException
        constructor
        Parameters:
        xml - a note element from an Msm object; can also be a performed Msm with the additional performance data
        Throws:
        com.sun.media.sound.InvalidDataException

        This method is only used when loading an MPM Toolbox project. It sets the data from the project file in this note.
